attributes.action: Getting a button on facebook and other social networking sites to report child abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what we are wanting is a panic type of button to be placed on social netwoking sites especially facebook in light of what tragically happened last week so that if people suspect child abuse then they can click on the button and send a report and get positive action taken to deal with the abusers
